paragraph.paragraph: The References folder has a simple context menu accessible by right clicking on the folder. The available items are as follows:

Add Reference
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/urfAddReferenceDialogBox.htmAdd Reference Dialog Box to permit adding of project references.
